targets.query: SELECT percentile("completeResponseTimeMs", 95) AS "Complete 95th", percentile("completeResponseTimeMs", 50) AS "C 50th", median("completeResponseTimeMs") AS "C Median", mean("completeResponseTimeMs") AS "C Mean" FROM "SearchOperations" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$idu_host$/ AND "type" =~ /^$search_type$/ AND "dayCount" =~ /^$time_filter_day_amount$/ AND "cached" =~ /^$search_cached$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "type", "dayCount", "cached"
SELECT  percentile("completeResponseTimeMs", 95) AS "Complete 95%" FROM "OperationCompleted" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "type"
SHOW TAG VALUES EXACT CARDINALITY  from "SearchOperations"  WITH KEY = "requestId" WHERE scenarioType=~/$ScenarioType/ and dayCount=~/$time_filter_day_amount/ and  host=~/$idu_host/ group by "type"

panels.description: Ratio of cache hits to lookups for the current index searcher.
panels.title: Searcher Cache - Avg. %Hit Ratio - Group by Type

targets.query:
SELECT "completeResponseTimeMs" FROM "SearchOperations" WHERE ("dayCount" =~ /^$time_filter_day_amount$/ AND "type" =~ /^$search_type$/ AND "host" =~ /^$idu_host$/ AND "scenarioId" =~ /^$ScenarioId$/ AND completeResponseTimeMs > 60000) 

AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "requestId", "scenarioId"

SELECT count(completeResponseTimeMs) FROM "SearchOperations" WHERE ("dayCount" =~ /^$time_filter_day_amount$/ AND "type" =~ /^$search_type$/ AND "host" =~ /^$idu_host$/ AND "scenarioId" =~ /^$ScenarioId$/ AND completeResponseTimeMs < 60000) AND $timeFilter  group by scenarioId

SELECT count(completeResponseTimeMs) FROM "SearchOperations" WHERE ("dayCount" =~ /^$time_filter_day_amount$/ AND "type" =~ /^$search_type$/ AND "host" =~ /^$idu_host$/ AND "scenarioId" =~ /^$ScenarioId$/ AND completeResponseTimeMs > 60000 AND completeResponseTimeMs < 120000) AND $timeFilter  group by scenarioId

SELECT count(completeResponseTimeMs) FROM "SearchOperations" WHERE ("dayCount" =~ /^$time_filter_day_amount$/ AND "type" =~ /^$search_type$/ AND "host" =~ /^$idu_host$/ AND "scenarioId" =~ /^$ScenarioId$/ AND completeResponseTimeMs > 120000) AND $timeFilter  group by scenarioId

panels.title: Scenario requests by length of time
